text: 'All the quarters are all the prâ n as. And he (the Âtman in that state) can only be described by No 2 , no! He is incomprehensible, for he cannot be comprehended; he is undecaying, for he cannot decay; he is not attached, for he does not attach himself; he is unbound, he does not suffer, he does not perish. O G anaka, you have indeed reached fearlessness,'--thus said Yâ g ñ avalkya.
